originalText.text: I was told by way of internet to down load coupon to receive discount ,the rate for Saturday would be 20.00, for 6 hours of parking. the play wicked start at 2pm ,we parked at 1:30 show over at 5pm, gershwin theater adjacent to garage we were third in line to get our car, had to pay by card, charged 30.00.  With coupon in my han  teller snatches coupon out of my hand and refused to give me my coupon back, end result charged my card the mon. To fri. rate, stated coupon was incorrect.

originalText.text: Horrible Customer Service! They forgot to give me the ticket when I drop off my car. Then, when I went to pick it up they asked me for the ticket. I said ‘You didin’t give me one!’. The guy said ‘There is nothing I can do if you don’t have the ticket’. The guy was insane! I hardly got my car. DO NOT PARK HERE!!!

originalText.text: Lied and falsely advertised prices. Took my car and then up charged me later
